solution: Zone for more SROs and Microapartments
text: Cities should relax their zoning codes to allow more microapartment or SRO construction where there is market demand. We estimate a potential U. S. market demand of just under 90,000 market-rate microapartments.
Zoning for SROs or microapartments will be most financially attractive and politically palatable in an urban downtown [ocala_microapt] or in commercial or mixed use neighborhoods [simi_valley_sro].
